name: APOCALYPSE: Danger Zone
description:
Apocalypse: Danger Zone is shooter game where your task is to kill zombies.

Game includes 3 diffrent levels.

To kill zombies you can use 5 types of weapon.

 You can chose your strategy: killing zombies in big shootouts or creeping and assasinations.

Game has great post-apo climate created by music, lighting and no-man environment.

Instuction in game.

Apocalypse: DZ is finished project, but it may has updates in future.

To make this game I used some resources from Uniyt Asset Store. Full list is in project.

If you find any bug writel me about this in comments.

Write me your opinion about this game in comments.
